doc.title: Maya
doc.plot: Maya is a single woman, approaching 30. Her intrusive mother sets her up with a doctor and sends her money every week to use on therapy. The date with the doc is a bust, but Maya gets an idea: instead of using mom's money on therapy, why not take dance lessons? There she meets Sascha, a terrific dancer with a winsome, open spirit. Maya finds herself contriving to talk to Sascha at every opportunity. Soon, Maya knows that in dance, and perhaps in Sascha, she has found herself.
